introduction: Hello, my name is Pepper. I will be your co-chair this afternoon.
I will make sure that the speakers keep the time of their presentations.
Serena Ivaldi will now introduce the workshop.
The first speaker is Francesco Nori, from Google Deep Mind.
We now have the short presentations from the authors presenting a poster.
I hope your coffee was good. The next speaker is Abderramane Kheddar, from LIRMM.
The next speaker is Rudolf Lioutikov, from TU Darmstadt.
The next speaker is Dongheui Lee, from TU Munich and DLR.
Keep the questions for the discussions in the afternoon! Now it is time for lunch. See you at half past one!
Welcome back! We have great speakers for this afternoon session. The first speaker is Chris Atkenson, from CMU.
The next speaker is Sethu Vijaykumar, from the University of Edinburgh.
Time for coffee and posters! See you in 20 minutes!
Welcome back, I hope your coffee was good. The next speaker is Graham Deacon, from Ocado Technologies.
The next speaker is Luka Peternel, from IIT.
Wow, we had a lot of interesting talks today. Time to discuss!
Sorry to interrupt, but it is time to leave the room! Thanks for the beautiful discussions. I cannot drink, otherwise I would join you for a drink in a British pub! Well, see you tomorrow.
